Title: Relates to granting certain individuals youthful offender status; repealer
Summary: Increases the age of a person from nineteen to twenty-two to be deemed a youth for youthful offender status and provides that there is a presumption of such status unless the interest of justice requires otherwise and proper notice is given.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to granting certain individuals youthful offender status; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
